body_html:
@qlqqkq : Could you run the following set of commands and provide all the output?

ls bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/models/embedding/
bazel query --config=cuda 'somepath(//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package, //tensorflow/models/embedding:gen_word2vec)'
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_backage:build_pip_package
bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
ls bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/models/embedding/

body:
@qlqqkq : Could you run the following set of commands and provide all the output?

``` sh
ls bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/models/embedding/
bazel query --config=cuda 'somepath(//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package, //tensorflow/models/embedding:gen_word2vec)'
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_backage:build_pip_package
bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
ls bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/models/embedding/
```
